data.name: Adas Anti-Synthetic Rifle

notes.data: Deals and additional 1d6 damage to synthetic targets.

data.npcHit: deals half of the damage roll as lightning damage to 1 additional creature within 2m of the target. Deals an additional 1d6 damage to synthetic targets.

notes.data: On a hit, deals an additional 2d4 thunder damage for each time the weapon was charged.

The Collector Assault Rifle does not use thermal clips. Instead use a d8 to track the "heat". Every round you fire the weapon, spin down the die 1 face. If you don't fire the weapon, spin the die up 1 face. This represents the weapon internally cooling off. If you ever spin down the die to 0, the weapon jams and cannot be fired again this combat.
Deals radiant damage.

Instead of making a ranged weapon attack, the target makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + DEX modifier). Do not add your DEX modifier to a Double Tap atttack. If you are proficient with Assault Rifles, add your proficiency bonus to the DC. On a failed save, the target takes 1d8 thunder damage, or half as much on a successful one.

Somewhat of a relic and hard to come by, the M-7 does not use thermal clips. Instead use a d8 to track the "heat". Whenever you make a ranged attack with the weapon, spin down the die 1 face. If you don't fire the weapon, spin the die up 2 faces. This represents the weapon internally cooling off. If you ever spin down the die to 0, the weapon jams and cannot be fired again this combat.
It cannot benefit from Magazine mods.
Custom made for its owner, when you purchase this weapon, you may choose one of the following:

data: Increase damage of this weapon to d8
Reloading this weapon is a bonus action
+2 on ranged attack rolls made with the weapon

notes.data: AC +1 when holding this weapon.

The Particle Rifle does not use thermal clips. Instead use a d4 to track the "heat". Whenever you make a ranged attack with the weapon, spin down the die 1 face. If you don't fire the weapon, spin the die up 1 face. This represents the weapon internally cooling off. If you ever spin down the die to 0, the weapon jams and cannot be fired again this combat.
Deals radiant damage.

After making a ranged attack with the Striker, you may choose to enter the {targeting} condition. At the start of your next turn, all ranged attacks made with the Striker deal an additional 1d12 damage, at the cost of 2 heat per attack. This bonus continues to stack at the start of your turn until the targeting condition ends or until the Striker must be reloaded. For example, the 3rd round would deal 3d12 for 3 heat per attack, etc.

data.name: Acolyte

notes.data: Deals force damage. Damage done by this weapon cannot be reduced by using barrier ticks.

data.npcHit: the target cannot use barrier ticks to reduce the attack damage.

data.name: Arc Pistol
data.npcHit: deals half of the damage roll as lightning damage to 1 additional creature within 2m of the target.

notes.data: Deals thunder damage. Missed shots adhere to nearby surfaces and do 1d4 thunder damage instead to the target instead.

Choose a creature within 60m that you can see and begin Targeting that creature. At the start of your turn, if you successfully held your targeting on the creature,  you launch a missile that deals 8d12 thunder damage.

Release a torrent of bullets in a sweeping arc in front of you until the start of your next turn. You are considered to be Targeting until the start of your next turn. Creatures that enter or move within a 10m cone in front of you make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 12d4 piercing damage. On a success, a creature takes half damage. Each turn uses a charge.

Sweep fire across the battlefield. Creatures within a 6m cone must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 13). On a failed save, a creature takes 4d6 fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Choose a creature within 60m that you can see and begin Targeting that creature. If you successfully held your targeting for one turn, at the start of your next turn you fire a unique missile at each target. When the missile hits, it deploys 3 shaped charges. The first disrupts any barriers or shields, any barriers or shields the creature has are completely removed. The second charge cripples armor; the creature has their AC reduced by 3 for the remainder of combat. The final charge deal 4d12 thunder damage. The creature can attempt a Constitution saving throw to cut the damage in half.

Spend a round Targeting as you sweep the battlefield for all enemies. At the start of your next turn, choose up to 10 enemy creatures and launch a miniature missile at them, dealing 4d8 thunder damage. You cannot target a creature twice. Each missile used consumes a weapon charge.

Spend a round Targeting, charging up the Cain's core. At the start of your turn, you can choose to continue targeting to increase the power of the blast. You can continue Targeting as long as the Cain has weapon charges left. When you're ready to release the blast, choose a fixed point within 60m. You release a small nuclear explosion in the area. Roll X + 5d12 where X is the number of charges you use multiplied by 2. Any creature within 2m automatically fails the saving throw. Creatures within 10m make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes radiant damage equal to your roll. On a success, a creature takes half damage.
Choose a creature within 60m that you can see and begin Targeting that creature. At the start of your turn, if you successfully held your targeting on the creature, it takes 15d10 necrotic damage.

Spend a round Targeting a 10m x 20m rectangle, up to 60m away. At the start of your turn, call down an orbital strike. Creatures within the rectangle make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 8d12 thunder damage. On a success, a creature takes half damage.

data.name: Asari Huntress Sword

notes.data: Kinetic energy from successful melee attacks grant a minor biotic boost. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, as a bonus action, you may cast a biotic cantrip.

data.npcHit: the attacker may cast a biotic cantrip as a bonus action.

data.name: Kahjean Venom Dagger

notes.data: When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

data.npcHit: the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

data.name: Krogan Warhammer

notes.data: When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC = 8+Proficiency Bonus+ Strength modifier) or is knocked {prone}.
*If wielded by a Krogan or another creature with a minimum Strength ability score of 18, this weapon becomes Versatile (1d12 for single-handed)

data.npcHit: the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 13) or is knocked {prone}.

notes.data: Drawing the Omni-Blade is a free action. Having this weapon equipped does not require a weapon slot.
Drawing the Omni-Hammer is a free action. Having this weapon equipped does not require a weapon slot.
Drawing the Omni-Taser is a free action. Having this weapon equipped does not require a weapon slot.

data.name: Omni-Torch

notes.data: Drawing the Omni-Torch is a free action. Having this weapon equipped does not require a weapon slot. Deals an additional 1d4 fire damage to {unprotected}, organic targets.

data.npcHit: if the target is {unprotected} and organic, it takes an additional 2 (1d4) fire damage.

notes.data: Drawing the Omni-Whip is a free action. Having this weapon equipped does not require a weapon slot.
+2 AC

data.name: Sawblade

notes.data: Deals an additional 1d6 slashing damage to {unprotected} targets.

data.npcHit: if the target is {unprotected}, it takes an additional 3 (1d6) slashing damage on the start of its next turn.

data.name: Stun Baton

notes.data: When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes and additional 1d4 lightning damage. If the target is {unprotected} and maintaining a concentration spell, it automatically fails its saving throw to maintain that spell.

data.npcHit: the target takes 2 (1d4) lightning damage. If the target is {unprotected} and maintaining a concentration spell, it automatically fails its saving throw to maintain that spell.

data.name: Disciple

notes.data: Deals bludgeoning damage. On a hit, the target must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8) or becomes {stunned}.

data.npcHit: the target must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8) or becomes {stunned}

notes.data: Deals radiant damage.

data.name: Graal Spike Thrower

notes.data: Deals an additional 1d6 damage to {unprotected} targets.

data.npcHit: if the target is {unprotected}, it takes an additional 3 (1d6) damage.

notes.data: When fired make a single attack roll against all creatures in a 4m cone. All creatures with AC less than the attack are hit.

data.name: Reegar Carbine
data.npcHit: deals half of the damage roll  as lightning damage to 1 additional creature within 2m of the target.

notes.data: Deals thunder damage. Instead of making a ranged weapon attack, target creature makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC13). On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.
+1 to hit targets within normal range

The Collector SMG does not use thermal clips. Instead use a d6 to track the "heat". Every round you fire the weapon, spin down the die 1 face. If you don't fire the weapon, spin the die up 1 face. This represents the weapon internally cooling off. If you ever spin down the die to 0, the weapon jams and cannot be fired again this combat.
Deals radiant damage.

data.name: Black Widow

notes.data: Ignores half cover. On a hit, if the target is not behind cover, it takes an additional 1d4 damage.

data.npcHit: if the target is not behind cover, it takes and additional 1d4 damage.

notes.data: Ignores half and three-quarters cover

data.name: Kishock Harpoon Gun

notes.data: On a hit, the target makes a Constitution (DC 13) saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes an additional 3d6 damage at the start of their turn due to blood loss.

data.npcHit: the target makes a Constitution (DC 13) saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes an additional 10 (3d6) damage at the start of their turn due to blood loss.

notes.data: +2 damage to synthorganic enemies
You can reload this weapon as a bonus action.

data.name: M-98 Widow

notes.data: Ignores half cover. On a hit, if the target is not behind cover, it takes an additional 1d4 damage.
